Summary: 3 bright orange lights in a row first the left faded then the right and the middle ..
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at Home walking unto the deck noticed 3 glowing bright lights in the Ne sky i glanced and began to notice they werent moving at all...my friend noticed to as soon as i pointed it out..we stared in aww at the sight i have no clue what it was...they stay lite for about 5-10 secs and vanished the stars where visible to me as soon as my eyes focused from the darkness like nothing was even there...weird i stood outside for about 45 mins after to see if anything would reappear but nothing ever did.
